metadata.title: Tamyaz - Integrated Agency for Digital & Creative Solutions
metadata.description: Comprehensive solutions in software, accounting, inventory, and creative production

hero.title: Is It
hero.description: Whether you need to create a brand identity, website, mobile app, marketing campaign, or even accounting and inventory systems - the key to making your project a success starts with having a well-thought-out creative brief.

about.title: At Tamyaz, We Help You Manage Your Business Comprehensively
about.subtitle: We provide integrated solutions including:
points: Professional accounting systems to manage your finances with ease and accuracy
Smart inventory management system to track products and sales
Professional video production for marketing and advertising content
Comprehensive media and digital content management across all platforms

specializations.title: Our Comprehensive Services
specializations.teamText: Integrated solutions for your digital business success

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our services

items.question: What services does Tamyaz provide?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive solutions including accounting and inventory management systems, professional video production, digital content management, and complete creative production.

items.question: How do your accounting systems help in business management?
items.answer: We provide advanced accounting systems that help you track revenues and expenses, issue invoices, manage employee payroll, and prepare financial reports with accuracy and ease.

items.question: What are the features of your inventory management system?
items.answer: Our system allows you to track inventory in real-time, alerts for low stock, supplier management, sales tracking, and detailed reports on inventory movement.

items.question: What types of videos do you produce?
items.answer: We produce marketing videos, commercial ads, social media content, product showcase videos, and event and conference coverage.

items.question: How do you manage digital content?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive content management for social media platforms, content writing, post design, publishing schedules, and audience engagement.

items.question: Do you provide customized solutions for each client?
items.answer: Yes, each project is designed according to your specific needs, whether in software systems or creative production, to ensure the best results.

footer.thankYou: Thank you for trusting us and we look forward to working with you soon
